name: DEX THE COON
description:
OVERVIEW:

IN DEX THE COON YOU PLAY AS THE RACCOON "DEX" WHICH HAS TO FIND CRYSTAL SHARDS TO REBUILD A POWERFUL CRYSTAL THAT WAS DESTROYED.

THE GAME IS A CLASSIC "COLLECT-A-THON" IN WHICH YOU NEED TO FIND CRYSTAL SHARDS IN ORDER TO PROGRESS IN THE STORY. 

THE WORLD IS STRUCTURED IN A BIG, CONNECTING WORLD. A ROCKY HUB AREA, A SANDY LEVEL 1 AND A SWAMPY LEVEL 2.

STORY:

MANY YEARS AGO, OUR FOREFATHERS CREATED A BIG CRYSTAL. THE RESIDENTS OF OUR WORLD WORSHIPED HIM. IT MADE THE LAND FERTILE AND THE WATER CLEAN. BUT NO ONE WAS EVER ALLOWED TO TOUCH THE CRYSTAL, AS THE LAST PERSON WHO DID OVERCOME BIG MISFORTUNE. THIS TRADITION WENT ON FOR CENTURIES TILL "THEY" CAME, WE NEVER KNEW WHAT "THEY" WERE OR WHERE "THEY" CAME FROM, BUT "THEY" CAME WITH BIG BOATS OUT OF THE SKY. AT THE BEGINNING EVERYTHING WAS PEACEFUL, AND WE SHARED WHAT WE HAD WITH "THEM" TILL "THEY" FOUND OUT ABOUT THE BIG CRYSTAL. "THEY" GOT GREEDY AND STARTED TO LOOSEN THE CRYSTAL, BUT IT EXPLODED, AND HIS CRYSTAL SHARDS GOT SCATTERED ALL  AROUND THE WHOLE VALLEY. AFTER THAT, "THEY" GOT VERY ANGRY AND WANTED US TO MAKE A NEW CRYSTAL, BUT AS "THEY" SOON FOUND OUT, NO ONE WOULD HELP "THEM". AFTER THAT, "THEY" WENT BACK IN "THEIR" FLYING BOATS AND TOOK MANY OF OUR PEOPLE WITH "THEM", THOSE FEW OF US WHO ARE LEFT ARE NOW HIDING IN FEAR.

THERE ARE NOT MANY LEFT OF US. HELP US "DEX". FIND THE SHARDS AND REBUILD THE CRYSTAL SO WE CAN RISE AGAIN.
